title: REFUND SKIN PLZ
body: PLEASE REFUND DRAGON TRAINER TRISTANA? BECAUSE THIS SKIN SALS SOON PLEASE 1820 AT discount 1350 PLEASE

replies.body:
Hey there,

If you've used up all your available refund tokens then you're out of luck, Riot doesn't offer refunds for any purchased content.

You should look up the sales schedule prior to purchasing an expensive skin to ensure the item isn't about to go on sale.
